case.state: You can't hide behind your princess forever, Corgi~
Well, at least you don't feel shameful about it, but you ain't making it any fun for us.
Oh, come on! If you wanted to be degraded, go look for someone else to do it.
I know I'm good looking, but put some clothes on. It's no fun kicking someone's ass who doesn't fight back.
You sure you can beat Team Aqua looking like that? Good luck, kid.
Ara ara, what do we have here? I didn't know engineers could be so handsome~
You chose the best grunt for the job!

You are challenged by
Team Aqua Grunt!
Team Aqua here to show you how it's done!
Really? I mean really?, dude? Go back and change your name.
Oh? You must be a psychic user, aren't you?
Orgies are for girls that win at strip poker, Panty. Better start playing or you won't get what you want.
Team Magma is here? Time to show them who the better team is!
Followed the better team to the strip club huh? Don't worry, I will show you how it's done.
Oh hell yeah! Count me in!
It would be a shame if someone started some mean rumors about you because of this, Nagisa.
Good job, "Daddy". Hope you're proud of yourself.
Prepare to be blown out of the water, Magma Loser!
That... Is a very impressive costume. That is a costume right?
Well, I know I wont get bored with you playing with us. Make it a good show for us, will ya?
You're Storm? The Storm? We're going to have a lot of fun together~
Best bring your A game if you want to beat Team Aqua.
Team Aqua doesn't lose! Prepare yourselves.
My name isn't important. Just call me Aqua Grunt -- AG for short.
My name? Just call me Aqua Grunt -- AG for short.
This is perfect, no need to swap.
I will keep these, thank you very much.
Ha! As expected from a Team Aqua Member, no swap needed!
Come on be good! Swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Cards, don't betray me now. Swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ .
Let's change it like this. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Hit me up with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
I'll exchange this ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Come on be good! ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Don't fail me now, cards! ~cards.Text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Giving you my best from the start!
I expect nothing less for a Team Aqua grunt!
Perfect! Not changing a thing about this.
Ha! Try to beat this one ~player~!
Why mess with perfection?
I ain't losing this round, go look at the others.
Critical hit!
This hand is as flawless as Team Aqua.
Silence before the storm.
As reliable as a Crawdaunt.
A hand more fierce than a Sharpedo!
Almost as trustworthy as my Spheal! Almost.
No need to look at me for this round, ~player~. I ain't losing it.
You wish your hand was as good as mine, ~player~.
I hope you have your Pokédollars ready for when I win this all, ~player~!
Shelly would be proud if she saw me having this hand! That's my boss if you didn't know already.
It seems like swimming and Pokémon battles aren't my only good skills.
(Perfect! Just what I needed to stay in the game.)
(Ah, just in time. Had this been any worse, I would have to show off just a little to much.)
(I have to say, quite the good looking people playing today.)
Could have used these earlier but hey, who am I to complain about a free win?
I will get trough this, I'm the best underling around.
Don't count me out yet! You will all go down before me, no matter how many more times I need to win!
I make my biggest waves when I'm at my lowest!
Payback time!
Could have used these cards earlier, but life doesn't always go as planned now does it?
I may have been losing the battle, but I will win the war, for Team Aqua!
Even when I am at my lowest, a true Team Aqua member doesn't give up.
I have shown off quite enough by now, time to turn it around.
(Phew, a good hand just when I needed it.)
You pushed me far, But I think it's high time to flip the script and have me winning again.
It was getting a little too hot beneath my feet. But with this hand I have cooled right off.
Don't count me out just yet. I have my Team Aqua pride to protect!
Uh uh! You won't beat me that easy, ~player~. You're gonna have to try a little harder than that to beat Team Aqua!
Be happy that you all manage to get me this far, if Shelly was here she would have kicked all your asses.
Count yourself lucky that you managed to get this far against me. I won't be losing again.
It seems you can all enjoy my midriff a little longer~
You know what's more fun than seeing me strip? Seeing all of you strip instead.
Hmph, you could have given me something better for my first hand, dealer.
Really? That's all you have for me, dealer?
Okay isn't good enough anymore! Let me swap again.
You wouldn't want to make Team Aqua your enemy, right, dealer?
Everyone can already see enough of me, no need to give me these mediocre cards!
These cards are really testing my patience. Like waiting on a stalling enemy.
I suppose these should get me through this round. No it's not medicore, ~player~.
(Being exposed like this while other people can see me is oddly erotic.)
(Eyes are on me right now. Why do I like this so much?)
By my pride as a Team Aqua grunt! I will not lose this round! (...Maybe)
(Maybe losing one more round wouldn't be THAT bad right?) Huh? I was just thinking about something private, eyes on the cards ~player~.
Having a okay hand is starting to become a nuisance. Give me a better hand next time, dealer.
Next time, let me shuffle the cards, dealer. I promise I won't cheat. He he~
I don't mind wearing a little less~ But don't expect more than this.
Yeah, I got nothing clever to say.
Such a shame that these are the kind of hands I end up the most with, I'd rather have the certainty of a win or a loss than having to guess.
Wouldn't mind a lucky crit right about now.
I wonder if the others are done modifying the submarine.
With how boring this hand is I rather have my focus on all of you instead.
Ugh, I hope I don't have to start showing more because of this lousy hand.
Good grunts follow orders.
All kinds of folk walking around here. Some of them with a lot of money on them....Hehehe~
There are a lot of reasons to be part of Team Aqua. The most important part is that we care about Pokémon, Unlike a certain other team of losers.
Not good enough to be worthy for a Team Aqua member. But I will make it work.
Do you wonder why I won't give you my name? You don't need to know it. All you need to know is that I am a proud member of Team Aqua!
Say, you wouldn't happen to have some money on you, ~player~?
I just saw someone with a sapphire necklace. Just gotta mark down which room they went into for later.
Want to know what I got? Tough luck!
I actually prefer blackjack over poker. Less luck reliant.
This is no Hydro Cannon. I can say that much.
Hey... You wouldn't happen to have some cash on you, do ya ~player~?
It's not like I can change my hand now, so let's see who the loser is going to be this round.
It feels weird not having my Team Aqua bandana on.
I already miss my Team Aqua bandana.
Dealer! You better not be pulling a fast one on Team Aqua!
Oh, so that's how it's going to be huh?
(I cannot show weakness now, my pride as a Team Aqua member is on the line!)
Team Aqua grunt has swapped cards! It was not very effective...
Do you want to sleep with the Wishiwashi, dealer?
(With this hand I will lose for sure! ...But is that really a bad thing right now?)
Me? Losing? Don't you even think about it ~player~!
(Shelly always said to keep your head cool even when facing defeat. keep that in mind, show no weakness!)
This...is a perfectly good hand, yup. Nothing bad about this.
If you were going to do me dirty like this dealer, you could have at least bought me a drink.
Did you know that humans used to hunt Lapras to the point they almost went extinct? Team Aqua was not going to let that happen!
Can you believe that there are people that throw out car batteries into the ocean? What in the world are they thinking!?
I don't like fishers, even if they throw the Pokémon they catch back into the ocean when they're done. They are still hurting the Pokémon for no other reason than their own amusement!
I'd would rather walk trough a cave full of Zubat than get another hand like this.
It's not that I hate Fire-type Pokémon. On the contrary, I care about all Pokémon. I just don't particularly like them.
Can I use a repel to repel this hand? No? Ugh...
(I should have bought some aces with me before coming here.)
(Well, it seems like I'm going to lose this round. Might as well look around for something valuable to steal before I leave this place.)
I wish Amber was here, he would know what to do with these cards.
Might as well throw these cards to a Sharpedo.
Magikarp using Splash is more useful than this.
Do you want my foot up your ass, dealer?
I'm not mad, just disappointed.
Very funny, now give me my real cards.
I know you all want to see more of me, but giving me bad cards on purpose is just bad sportsmanship.
Do you all want to see more of me this badly?
Aren't you all happy I have shown as much as I have? So why give me these garbage cards!?
Dealer. You should be happy that Matt isn't here, he would have given you the piledriver for giving me this hand
It's because I'm such a good grunt that a loss more isn't a big deal.
(Ah shit. I'm really going to have to show it to them all, huh?)
A Team Aqua grunt deserves better than this!
(Oh....I think I better mentally prepare myself for what's to come.)
Jeez, just look at that butt. You could play bongos on those.
Oh, that's nothing, Fluttershy. Wailord can grow up to be at least 14,5 Meter! And weight a whopping 400 KG! But I wouldn't really call them just a fish either.
Sure champ, go get her. I get to see 2 hotties doing it with one another. I call that a win.
Have you seen how many girls are walking around here, Leonie? We should count ourselves lucky we even got one on the table to play with us. And a pretty one at that~
Can't go wrong with some metal, right? Blasting it on my speakers while sailing really gets the blood pumping.
Nothing better than singing sea shanties with the team.
Ever heard of the band Alestorm? Trust me, they go in hard.
Don't worry about it, I have lived many years near sailors and pirates. Trust me when I say that I'm used to it.
It's cute seeing you so worked up about this~ But wouldn't losing be so much more fun?
Oh you know, not much, spotting pokémon, go for a swim, find clue's about a mysterious blue orb. Basic stuff really.
Do it! Give us a show to remember!
Just use an ice move, and capture them with a Pokéball. No need to kill them!
Oh lord~ Just look at that. Got to stop myself from pinching your cheeks~
Just another day being a Team Aqua grunt. What I'm going to do is a secret~
I heard that Team Magma was active here, so I came to investigate. Stuck around for all the hot guys and girls walking around~
I have already found my passion and pirate group, Meia. I wouldn't trade it for anything in the world.
As a member of Team Aqua, when we heard that Team Magma was spotted here, I was sent too investigate and have some fun to the side~
The cat is out of the bag now, I must say that I preferred the mysterious nature you had around you before you transformed. But what I'm seeing now is fine too~
It's quite the opposite for me Pyrrha, I don't want to be famous at all, I want my team to be famous instead.
Nothing beats getting a good haul and spending it on new clothes, or toys for my Spheal!
Ah, an animal lover like me then? Just be sure to keep Botan close to you -- there are all kinds of weird people out there who would want to harm him.
What else but blue? The color of the ocean, sapphires, the sky. What's not to love?
Wait...you can't swim? If you came where I come from it would have been suicide. if you come by I could help you learn.
You know what? You're right about that, Rita. If it wasn't for Poké balls, capturing and bonding with Pokémon would not be this easy.
I don't struggle with that at all~ Well, why not come with me after the game, Mercy? I will show you how I'm like~
I've had my fair share of friends like that in the past. But now I'm mostly busy being a Team Aqua grunt, so I don't have much time anymore for it, so who knows what we could end up doing tonight~
It's a nice butt, ~Fluttershy~. No need to be shy about it, show it off all you like.
Do I really need to spell it out, oh mighty Miko? I want Team Aqua to beat Team Magma and bring balance to the world!
Trust me, Mercy. Nothing feels better than to go skinny dipping after a long day of work. You should try it sometime -- I can recommend it.
Good for you girly! You got to be proud of yourself for coming so far. If you don't celebrate your achievements, who will?
Don't beat yourself up about it -- short people need love too. It helps that they are often light enough to carry around however you want. Hehe~
She says, with a knife in her hand. Are you really sure it's not true?

Girl, you need to have some more pride in yourself, You look amazing and should be proud of that, and if you don't, I will bring my friends with me next time and I can assure you that they will say the same thing as me.
My Spheal. Nothing is cuter than my Spheal. It's this small orb like Pokémon that I wouldn't trade for the world.
So what if we put a target on our back? You have to do a little bad to do something good! You'll see.
We aren't raising the sea levels...Right? Yeah, no we aren't! We are just taking parts of other island to add more sea and help Pokémon!
I mean...You got a good point, but no! You forget the part in which we also stop the ones throwing all the garbage in the ocean! Yeah that's also a good reason!
Sure kid, knock yourself out.
No risk no reward, kid. Making big steps like these are never easy, and not everyone is willing to take the first step like us.
Do you even listen to me? We aren't getting rid of all land. just a bit here and there that needs change, you would need to hear Archie talk about it, he does it better than me.
Crawdaunt really are the most reliable crustaceans there are. When they use Crunch, it's over for the enemy Pokémon.
They might be reliable, but Crawdaunt have this weird habit of wanting to snap your panties in half. So you always have to watch out for them whenever you are sun bathing.
Have you ever seen a Spheal? They're are these adorable round Pokémon with boundless energy. You won't find a fire Pokémon even half as cute as it.
Spheal are more than meet the eye you know. They can evolve into Sealeo, and then after that, evolve into a mighty Walrein! Beware those ivory tusks.
Sharpedo really are the best to traverse the waters with. If you want to go somewhere fast, then they're your best bet.
If you ever see two Sharpedo fighting one another while swimming, you better take a different route. Those two could be fighting for days on end.
Wait, we don't get any money when we win? Not even a little? Well crap, and here I wanted to buy some new clothes tomorrow.
I know this is strip poker, but doesn't the winner get at least something? Like even just a little bit of money? No? Shame...
Shelly is the reason I became a Team Aqua member in the first place. Her style and grace is unmatched, I really look up to her.
Shelly is the beauty of the 7 seas. Without her, Team Aqua would not be the same.
Surprised that I don't mind losing more than being uncertain? As a trainer even the best like me lose from time to time. I can learn from losing, not from losing because of luck.
It is fun to get a lucky crit it when it really counts, but those kind of victory's just don't feel the same. I have my pride after all.
These days there are more Lapras than ever! With the help of Team Aqua, of course.
It is because of Team Aqua, that there are plenty of Lapras swimming around again.
Fishers don't use hooks anymore? Just lure on a stick that they bite on? Couldn't they have done that from the start?
Well I'll be damned! They don't use hooks anymore? Just lures on a stick? Why didn't they just do that from the beginning!?
Wait. People aren't throwing car batteries into the ocean? it's just a meme?
What do you mean that it's just a meme? People wouldn't lie on the internet! Right?
Who's Amber, you ask? Well wouldn't you like to know huh? Hehe.
The only thing you need to know is that Amber is one of the best Team Aqua members we have!

Matt is one of my bosses, a big hunk of a guy that managed to punch a Snorlax in the face with such power that it didn't wake up from it! (Or maybe it was just sleepy and didn't want to stand up after that.)
Matt is quite the dreamy guy, and a great muscle if you ever need something heavy be moved. (Even if he isn't the smartest around.)
(It can't just be me who is getting hot from all of this right? I should really take a swim after all of this is done.)
I could really go for some skinny dipping after this, the heat is killing me.
Okay, okay I'll take something off, but in exchange you better listen to what I have to say about Team Aqua's goal!
You know what? Why talk about clothes right now. Let me tell you something really important instead. Team Aqua's goal!
You don't have to trust me, Rita. I'm just here to kick Team Magma's butt! And have some fun to the side ofcourse.

Well duh, of course I wanted to track you down. We are sworn enemies after all and I got to be sure that I know what you sneaky nerds are up to. But I didn't know that Team Magma were such perverts, spending time in a strip poker joint~
Have you even been in a single Pokémon battle? Water beats fire, you Cascoon-for-brains.
Oh, my mistake. I thought you were using a Ligma.
Ugh, you have no idea how mad this makes me. Not only do I lose my most precious Team Aqua bandana. But a Team Coward member sees me doing it. I'll get you back for this, girly.
No, I don't have Milktanks like yours. But I can assure you, there is plenty to love here~

Oh please, ~player~ only really has one choice. I mean, just look at how flexible I am. I'm built for all kind of positions~ There is a lot to love with a girl like her, but I'm an adventure on my own~
Yes she can! Yesterday, she protected me from a group of Wingull, by slamming into them as they tried to steal my fries!
You hit the nail right on the head there, Yuno. I'm all that, and much, much more.
You would be correct, lady Heris. But I'm far more than just a simple pirate.
Have you seen all the garbage humans throw in the ocean without care? Like, for real? Hmph! We got to fix that, one way or another!
If only it was as simple as it seemed. The truth is that the ocean is being polluted beyond fixing. At least that's what Archie told me.
My job is both my name and my passion. So just keep calling me Aqua Grunt, or AG for short.
Thanks, Kumatora. Don't you worry about me though, I always carry sunscreen with me. And I gotta say, you're rocking that pink hair!
Don't worry about me, Kumatora. I always have suncreen with me. And I gotta say girl, that hair of yours rocks! It really fits you.
I'm all natural, baby. And I ain't afraid to show it~
Someone who sees my best quality's from the start, a rare sight these days. But you're right, they are real~
What could ever give you that impression, Saki? Hehe~
I ride the the deep sea on a daily basis, Revy. Maybe you're just not cut out for it.
Not everyone can tame the sea, Revy. What kind of pirate can't handle a little bit of water?
This is a costume, yeah. I'm part of a elite team that is bend on restoring balance to our world.
Was it that obvious? But you're correct, Mari. I set sail all the time.
The goal isn't to fill the world with just more water. The goal is to let people know and see the beauty of the ocean along with the pokemon living in it.
The world is blue enough once the Water-type Pokémon are free from all the filth humans throw in the ocean.
You wouldn't be too far off there, Estelle. You could consider Team Aqua to be one big naval guild, our main objective being to protect the vulnerable sea Pokémon.
Because I'm just here to have a little fun, that's all~
Well you see my dear, Fluttershy. Our genius leader has located a artifact that will allow us to ask the aid of a legendary Pokémon to help us!
That's right, I'm Team Aqua's number one Grunt, and I am proud of that!
It's my job title, I'm a elite grunt for Team Aqua. So call me Aqua Grunt, or AG for short.
The grunt part is simply my status in the team. Though, I'm the highest ranking grunt of the bunch.
I'm proud to be a grunt for Team Aqua. Besides, I'm also the highest ranking one.
And who are you to judge me, kid?
Big words coming from someone that came out of the clown store. So what's your deal?
The tides turned on me, I need to respect it or be swept away by the currents.
Even a elite Aqua grunt as me can lose twice in a row, it doesn't matter as long as I win at the end.
Again!? This starts to feel like there is foul play going on.
I can't Struggle like this....!
I will not accept that I just lost 4 times in a row! I just....Ugh fine.
Sinking deeper with every loss.
From fully clothed to almost nothing at all...
Self pity isn't going to get me anywhere here. Just give me a moment.
Wanted to see more of me that badly huh? No need to lie about it, I can see it in all of your eyes.
Fine fine, it seems all of you want to get to the good part quickly then. Be happy that you all get to see as much of me as you do.
Oh no, my shoes, whatever will I do next?
What? Not happy with the gloves and armbands I removed last time? Shame on you~
Don't get your hopes up now. Getting me to remove my shoes isn't much of a accomplishment.
Don't get to cocky now~ I am still in a comfortable position.
Alright alright, You all got me closer to your level, good job.
It's kind of sad that all of you have so much problems dealing with a single grunt~
Sure, I can show off a bit more. Given all of you are already showing more than me.
It's a bit of a shame you managed to get my bandana off, but my pride as a Team Aqua grunt exceeds it.
Bit of a shame that you all managed to get me this low, I like how my bandana feels.
It's getting down the wire now huh? I'm going to be honest, this is getting more exciting than I anticipated.
This grunt will go 'till the very end. Showing off my body for this win will be worth it, in the end.
You can get a good look, I don't mind. Just don't stare to intensely like a creep afterward, or I will smack you.
Well. I wasn't planning to show this much off when we first started. But at this point, I want to see it trough till the end.
It took you this long to get a grunt to be naked? You should all be ashamed of yourselves, hehe~
It all comes down to the last piece of clothing now doesn't it? Alright, lets do this.
Well look at that, so you did manage to get something off me after all.
Hope you enjoyed this little freebie of mine. That's all you will get.
Don't think that beating me now will change things much.
Don't be to happy now, what you are about to see is what my friends see all the time at our base.
I'm used to wearing just my shirt and panties. So it isn't really special that you all get to see this.
It seems that you all still have some fighting spirit left at this point. Good, it will only make my victory sweeter.
I don't mind it if you look at me right now, I walk around in my swimsuit all the time, this is hardly different.
Now now, don't get too happy, you're not going to see anything special.
Yeah you can all look, I'm proud of my body and don't mind if you look at me. Just don't be a creep about it.
I got nothing to worry about, it's but a minor set back.
I still have plenty to work with after this. I'm not worried.
Just because one of your Pokémon faint, that doesn't mean it's all over. Same thing with losing a round of strip poker.
Can't win them all.
My pride isn't something that breaks so easily, It's a minor loss.
For once, I'm playing by the rules, give me a second.
Don't get salty when I'm taking something small off~
These cards where hardly worthy enough for Team Aqua, I knew this was going to happen.
Just small stuff for now, so don't get your hopes up~
Fine, I'm taking off the bandana, what a waste.
I feel more embarrassed that I'll be losing my bandana than I thought I would.
I lost? Ugh, this bandana is part of my pride as a Team Aqua member. I wish I could keep it on longer, but so be it.
Wasn't planning to let you all get me this low, but it seems I must bare it all to win.
Didn't think you all had in it you to push me this far.
Well, at least we are all nearly naked. I should have played better.
I lost? On one hand, I have to strip, on the other hand, I can show something off that I'm proud off~
My loss? oh well~ I take as much pride in my body as I do as a Team Aqua member. So having to show it off is fine by me~
Me huh? Well, just appreciate what you're about to see.
Ugh fine, I guess it's already my turn to strip again.
Another loss while I'm down...
Me again? It's fine. I can handle it.
Again? I'm supposed to be better than this!
Feels like somebody is pulling a prank on me behind the scenes.
Ow come on, I don't want to get rid of my bandana already...Ugh.
How did it get to the point that I already have to remove my bandana?
Really? Me again? Well, there goes my bandana...
This is worse than when I...Wait, no never mind, this is worse.
This is starting to feel like a bad dream.
(Come on! Keep it together. Think about your pride, think about the possible comeback.)
I need a hyper potion...
Another loss when I'm already behind. Reminds me of... Forget it, it's not important.
I came here to relax and unwind from the daily struggles of being a grunt. But this has been more stressful than anything else.
Ugh, really? Again? Fine...
...Sigh, yeah yeah it's my turn to strip. Hold on for just one moment.
What? I lost already? That didn't go as planned.
Wait, how did I lose already?
Ganging up on me huh? I expected better from all of you.
I can spend my free time however I want, whenever I want. But if I'm on the job, then you're my target. How about I send Spheal out to teach you-- Crap! I left my Poké balls at the base!
Ligma balls, keh keh! Ahaha, I can't believe you fell for it!
Thank you? I think? But come on, girly. We as grunts care a lot for our special team clothing. You can understand the pain of having to lose it.
Almost all Aqua Grunts are swimmers, why would we wear something that would drag us down in the water like a bra? Are ya with me, ~player~?
But there's so much more fun that can be had with someone who can move her body in all kinds of fun ways~ With her you can, at best, do the missionary position, but with me? The fun never stops~
Oh yeah, how dangerous, are you going to teach your fire slug to throw grass or something? How scary.
Oh no, how scary. The Water-type Pokémon that you can dance with to pacify. Meanwhile, last month my Spheal fought off a Dragonite!
See it as a team of people who work together to save the ocean, and by extention also the oceanic Pokémon's that live inside of it.
So what is a pretty boy like you doing here? Hoping for a date?
And what about it? What would you do if you found out if I really was a pirate?
Who knows, you might just be right about that. But what would you do if it's true?
Not at all, this artifact we found should be able to keep it in check. Archie said so.
My original goal was to find Team Magma. But given they aren't here I decided to have some fun, which is why I'm still wearing my work clothes.
Well, yeah. I'm a low girl on the totem pole for my team. But that doesn't make me any less important. A group has to work together to fulfill their goal.
Hey! What's that suppose to mean?
What? Don't tell me that I don't look like a badass in this outfit.
Oh sure, once our team has fulfilled our duty. Until then, a grunt is all I need to be.
They help with throwing Poké Balls. But for the most part I wear them because they're part of my uniform.
Though it is part of my uniform, I've slapped some people around with them when needed.
Our goal is simple: stop humans from damaging the ocean by taking their land!
Team Aqua has one goal in mind: we're gonna bring back the balance between Pokémon and humans. And we're going to have a legendary Pokémon help us with it's ocean might!
I do like how these show off my figure. I train hard to get a swimmer's body like this.
Yes, these are as comfortable as they look. Yes, I'm annoyed that I have to take them off.
Having to take off my bandana hurts me more than you would think. It's the easiest way to show off my pride as a Team Aqua grunt.
Every single one of these bandanas are hand crafted and are a one of a kind. You better not lose it, or there will be hell to pay.
It's a good thing I got plenty to show~ I'm the most well endowed grunt of the entire team.
Even tough I have to take of my shirt, it kind of feels nice to let them out. These shirts are quite tight around the chest.
Well, this is a little embarrassing. I take good care of my body, so showing off isn’t that big of a deal. Just don’t stare∼
It's my only remaining option, and as the number one Team Aqua grunt, I won't back down.
Bit of a shame that it has to go, even just removing small things makes the Team Aqua look feel incomplete.
